visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales' with corresponding data. Additionally, specify custom colors for the series and include configurations for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a dark background, suitable for a high-contrast dark theme. The chart title is 'Monthly Sales Data' with white text and a font size of 24px. The x-axis and y-axis are styled with white labels and titles, and the y-axis title indicates the sales in thousands. The data series includes two sets of monthly sales data for 2022 and 2023, each with a distinct color. The legend is also styled with white text and a font size of 14px. The chart has specific margins to ensure all elements are clearly visible and not crowded.
